PaladinMod:AngelForm.NAME: Angel Form
PaladinMod:AngelForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: I am already in Angel Form.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I am already in Angel Form.

PaladinMod:DestructiveWave.NAME: Destructive Wave
PaladinMod:DestructiveWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

PaladinMod:DisarmingStrike.NAME: Disarming Strike
PaladinMod:DisarmingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If your Divinity is negative, enemy loses !M! Strength.

PaladinMod:DivineFavor.NAME: Divine Favor
PaladinMod:DivineFavor.DESCRIPTION: If your Divinity is positive, draw !M! cards. Lose !DIV! Divinity.

PaladinMod:HolyWrath.NAME: Holy Wrath
PaladinMod:HolyWrath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each Divinity you have. Lose all Divinity.

PaladinMod:LayOnHands.NAME: Lay on Hands
PaladinMod:LayOnHands.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. Permanently reduce the HP healed by 1.

PaladinMod:Massacre.NAME: Massacre
PaladinMod:Massacre.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Lose !DIV! Divinity.

PaladinMod:NeowGuidance.NAME: Neow's Guidance
PaladinMod:NeowGuidance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !DIV! Divinity. Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Intangible. Exhaust.

PaladinMod:Prayer.NAME: Prayer
PaladinMod:Prayer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Enemies lose !M! Strength. Exhaust.

PaladinMod:SearingSmite.NAME: Searing Smite
PaladinMod:SearingSmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal 5 damage for every !M! Divinity you have.

PaladinMod:WayOfVengeance.NAME: Way of Vengeance
PaladinMod:WayOfVengeance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Divinity, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.
